game

Class Tower

  • java.lang.Object
    • common.core.Sprite
      • common.core.ImageSprite
        • common.Tile
          • game.Tower
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.lang.Cloneable

    public class Tower
extends Tile
    Represents the tower and holds the tower sprite.
